item.title: 找到无序数组中某一频率的数
item.description: LeetCode 451. Sort Characters By Frequency Given a string, sort it in decreasing order based on the frequency of characters. Example 1: Input: “tree” Output: “eert” Explanation: ‘e’ appears twice while ‘r’ and ‘t’ both appear once. So ‘e’ must appear before both ‘r’ and ‘t’. Therefore

item.title: 数组排序之后相邻数的最大差值
item.description: LeetCode 164. Maximum Gap Given an unsorted array, find the maximum difference between the successive elements in its sorted form. Try to solve it in linear time/space. Return 0 if the array contains less than 2 elements. You may assume all elements in the array are non-negative integers and fit in the 32-bit signed integer range. 解析： 桶排序要求所有元素在一
